content.description: This is a great, non-intimidating and friendly spaced bolted line.
content.protection: 8 bolts to a two bolted chain anchor with quicklinks.
content.location:
This is to the right of

Logan's Run

.

content.description: The start is slightly overhanging with all sorts of fun moves to be had. Once over the lip, it mellows out to the anchors.
content.protection: 6 bolts to a 2 bolt chain anchor.
content.location:
It is just to the left of

Patience

.

content.description: Temptation has well-protected and thoughtful climbing. The upper bulge is the crux. Many of the holds you will think are jugs turn out to be slopers, making this a bit harder than it looks.
content.protection: 6 bolts to a two bolt anchor.
content.location:
It is left of

House of Cards

.

content.description: Face climb past two bolts, then gain the crack system for 3 more bolts to the anchor.
content.protection:
Five bolts to a two chain anchor.

Eds. Originally, this had 2 bolts and then was protected by gear to the bolted anchors.
content.location:
This is just to the right of

Rookies' Demise

.  On the left side of the lower level. Second route from left. Look for two bolts leading to a crack just right of pine tree at base.

content.description: This is a challenging climb that has a bit of everything from positive foot and hand holds to trusting a foot placement on a mossy ledge.
content.protection: 6 bolts to a 2 bolt chain anchor.
content.location:
It is to the right of

Dirty Downs

.  30’ down and right from large tree right at base of rock. The very toe of the rock in bright green moss.

content.description: Climb unprotected straight up or follow a short, right left (?) ramp to the first bolt. It is a good idea for the person belaying to wear a helmet until it cleans up.
content.protection: 4 bolts lead to a chain anchor with quicklinks.
content.location:
It is to right of

Simul I

, or to the left of

Trinity

.

content.description: A slightly overhanging start with huge holds leads a cruise to the top.
content.protection: 5 bolts to a 2 bolt anchor with chains.
content.location: This is the leftmost route on the lower wall.

content.description: A fun roof in the beginning leads to some easy climbing to the top.
content.protection: 5 bolts to a 2 bolt chain anchor.
content.location: This is to the right of Trinity

content.description: Everything you need is there but not necessarily easy to find the first time you climb it.
content.location:
It is to the right of

Incoming

.

content.description: Notches is a fun route with big holds everywhere with an interesting final roof move to the anchors. More cleaning on this new route is needed, so please test your holds, and for the belayer, a helmet would be a good idea.
content.protection: 7 bolts will get you to a 2 bolt anchor with chains.
content.location:
This is just to the right of

Logan's Run

.

content.description: Lucky Ledges is a fun, little route that fits the area. The route should clean up with time, but as of now, there is still some moss and lichen. I have tried to clean all it off the holds you’ll need. Be careful of lose rocks as this is a new route. The name is in reference to the jugs you will find right when you need them.
content.location:
It is between

Short-N-Sweet

and

Simul I

on its own little wall.

content.description: This is a great climb on interesting terrain with the crux just before the last bolt.
content.protection: 8 bolts to a 2 bolt chain anchor.
content.location:
This is to the right of

Patience

.

content.description: Incoming is a fun line with some thoughtful moves once you pass the 3rd bolt.
content.protection: 5 bolts to a 2 bolt chain anchor.
content.location:
This is to the right of

Aspirations

.

content.description: A variety of options can be utilized to ascend this route. It is sustained with tricky holds.

Start with a couple of roof moves to some fun face climbing. Then gain the small roof to a couple more face moves to the anchor.

I will be doing more cleaning on this route. Test your holds, and a helmet might be a good idea until this route sees more traffic.
content.protection:
7 bolts leads you to a two bolt chain anchor with quicklinks. This route shares anchors with the

Corner Route

.
content.location:
It is just to the right of the

Corner Route

.

content.description: This has a really fun start that mellows a bit to a couple of thoughtful last clips.
content.protection: 5 bolts to a 2 bolt chain anchor.
content.location: It is the first route in the main area.  20’ down and right of a large pine tree growing right at the base of cliff.

content.description: Climb up an inside corner to a small roof. Gain the roof, and make a couple of face climb moves to the anchors. Please test your holds. It is a good idea for the belayer to wear a helmet until this climb cleans up.
content.protection:
8 bolts lead to a 2 bolt chain anchor with quicklinks. This route shares anchors with

Face-it

.
content.location:
It is to the right of

Logan's Run

.

content.description: This is thin fun from start to finish.
content.protection:
2 bolt chain anchor.

There are now 2 bolts with quicklinks on top of this route that you can clip into to safely set up a toprope.
content.location:
It is the next route to the right of

Rookies' Demise

.
